review:
So here is thing Hi beautiful people around whom so ever gonna read.  Such a relief in this pandemic situation our warriors DOctors are still der for us to HelP. Hats off to them. So lets begin i was feeling sick from past few days so I wrote my health issues on free consultation. There where doctor who actually took interest in my health condition. But I was not satisfied. With answers. But yes their was one warrior who‚Äôs answer really satisfied me . So I consulted further my health issue actually I was quitting smoking I didn‚Äôt know the withdrawal symptoms of smoking can be that messy I was so worried becoz the symptoms were almost like pandemic (üåû)whole country is facing. Anxiety attacks many more fever nd all  He really helped me physiologically nd off courses by advising medicines he actually took his time for his patients. Which shows that how dedicated he is towards his work nd patient i was so relaxed . 
Can u imagine i m fully recovered without even taking ani medication becoz he made me strong by talking to me nd discussing stuff listening me nd many more
In the end Thanks a lot doctore 
Regards 
S.R

Dr. Lakir Vira is an amazing Doctor. He‚Äôs really patient and nice with her patients. I and my family had a wonderful experience consulting him. He is really knowledgeable and good with his work. We would definitely recommend him to everyone else too! Our experience with this doc was excellent!!

Had consulted him for an intimate issue. He handled the case very sensibly and prescribed ****** **** medicines as well, also put my mind at ease as I was panicking too much. He knows how to analyse each case sensitively and efficiently,even during the follow up he remained very attentive . Would 10/10 recommend him . üòÄüòÄ

Dr. Lakin vira is such a wonderful & generous person. He helped me to treat my stomach & allergic issues. He always answered my all doubts. I definitely recommend him for all kind of health related troubles especially stomach, infections & allergies.
Thank you so much :)
A highly recommended doctor. He has given me all the information thoroughly and assured me as I was really tensed regarding my problem. Thank you so much, keep doing well sir.
